comments:
I use j2sdk1.4.1_02 and wtp1.01.I tryed to use "Define a new server wizard" to create a new server.When I selected jbossv4.0 in "Choose the type of server to create" pane,the "next" button in this pane didn't function.
  The problem may associate whit the jdk.I changed j2sdk1.4.1_02 to j2sdk1.4.2_11 the problem disappeared.When I changed back to j2sdk1.4.1_02,the problem appeard again,then I only change "path" environment variable to point to j2sdk1.4.2_11 the problem didn't appear.So the problem should be there.
  I tryed wtp0.71 and wtp1.0,they also have the same problem.

Can you please check your .log file for exceptions or run with -consolelog and see if anything is written out to the console?
Do you have any other way to validate your 1.4.1_02 JDK or reinstall it? Since nobody else has reported this, it sounds most likely that your JDK has a bug, or that it has become corrupt on the filesystem.

(In reply to comment #1)

  I checked .log file,there is an exception like below.  I reinstalled jdk 1.4.1_02,the problem appeared like before.I also tested this on another machine,the phenomenon was the same.
